content.en: Radar algorithm optimization: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to address different challenges in radar systems. These algorithms, such as sparse basis representation and compressive sensing, basis pursuit of sparse decomposition, and blind source separation-based space-time multi-channel algorithm, are being used to reconstruct interference, discriminate jamming signals, detect moving targets, suppress jamming, and optimize waveforms. By leveraging the power of these algorithms, scientists aim to improve the performance and accuracy of radar systems in the presence of different types of interference and jamming.
content.da: Radaralgoritmeoptimering: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige udfordringer i radarsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom sparsom basisrepræsentation og kompressiv prøvetagning, basisforfølgelse af sparsom dekomponering og rum-tid flerkanalsalgoritme baseret på blind kildeadskillelse, bruges til at rekonstruere interferens, skelne jammingsignaler, detektere bevægelige mål, undertrykke jamming og optimere bølgeformer. Ved at udnytte styrken af disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre ydeevnen og nøjagtigheden af radarsystemer i nærvær af forskellige typer interferens og jamming.
